Articles.Content:
Features and Parts I would like to see added to the Klaw and Wheels(plus new versions of wheels)

The Klaw:

Ability to lock certain axis like pitch and yaw(So if I lock a axis I can't use it and would therefore be locked in a straight line)

Ability to attach stuff to it in assembly

A roll capability on the Klaw(This may be troublesome with the current version of it)

Wheels

Ability to change all wheel types to tank steer as multi wheeled vessels with tank steer do better

A track like thing which is extremely sturdy, providing another way of transportation for heavy craft

Ability to lock suspension on wheels
